title: Wild Rift Tier List
description: This tier list ranks all of the champions in Wild Rift from best to worst, based on the current meta. It is intended to help players choose champions to climb the ranked ladder. The tier list is divided into five tiers: S Tier, A Tier, B Tier and C Tier.
heading: Wild Rift Tier List
introText: This tier list ranks all of the champions in Wild Rift from best to worst, based on the current meta. It is intended to help players choose champions to climb the ranked ladder. The tier list is divided into five tiers: S Tier, A Tier, B Tier and C Tier.

data.itemDescription: A fighter with stealth abilities and strong area damage, effective in team fights

A durable and disruptive champion who excels in the Baron lane by poisoning enemies with his trail, grounding them with adhesive, and flinging key targets into his team

A tank with a powerful initiation ultimate and area damage

A transforming champion switching between ranged poke and melee tank forms
